name: Badlands Racer
description:
Badlands Racer is an arcade survival runner, scoring and ship upgrade.
You race through the Badlands, dodging a variety of static and dynamic obstacles of various shapes and sizes.
Along the way, you can meet several types of rings:
Blue - give 500 credits to buy new racers;
Green - give a turbo boost for a short time;
Red - give a slowdown for a short time.
Green and Red also give 500 credits to buy new racers.
The pace of the game increases very quickly and you will have to try to cover the longest distance, as well as you will need the best racer.
